page.title: 13PAYING AMUSEMENTS,WKS PK,KTG
page.content: In Wicksteed Park,there are plenty of exciting paying amusements e.g. Pirate Ship,Roller Coaster and Cine 2000.Last year the train was the most popular attraction,carrying 4,000,000 people all around the park.There are tennis courts,crazy golf,BMX track,boat trips on the lake, water slides and many other rides.On average a ride cost 40p and a book of tickets cost $ 1.50.There are 14 eating places,selling things like ice cream, candy floss,take away hot foods right up to a full scale restaurant meal.Wicksteed park also makes its own ice cream,making 9000 litres monthly in summer.In the function halls,dinner dances are held and often booked 10 years ahead.Usually 1,750,000 attend yearly,but in the last few years numbers have fallen because of unemployment in the area.
